item.title: Ethereum Network Stablecoin Supply Surpasses $160 Billion, Reaching an All-Time High
item.description: On August 31st, according to the data from Token Terminal, the supply of stablecoins on the Ethereum network has exceeded $160 billion and reached a new record high. The supply of stablecoins has more than doubled since January 2024.

item.title: The US Stock Market will be closed tomorrow.
item.description: On August 31st, due to the U.S. Labor Day holiday, the U.S. stock market will be closed on September 1st (Monday). The precious metals and WTI crude oil futures contracts of CME will close early at 02:30 on September 2nd Beijing time, and the stock index futures contracts will close early at 01:00 on September 2nd Beijing time. The Brent crude oil futures contracts of ICE will close early at 01:30 on September 2nd Beijing time. (FX678)

item.title: The high-profile ETH-to-BTC Whale has once again moved 2000 BTC to Hyperliquid in the last 6 hours for an ETH swap.
item.description: On August 31st, as monitored by Onchain Lens, a highly prominent BTC whale that has been actively swapping ETH has once again transferred 2000 BTC (valued at $218.24 million) to Hyperliquid within the past 6 hours in order to swap it for ETH.

item.title: 「Brother Buddy」 Huang Licheng currently holds approximately $130 million worth of ETH and HYPE long positions, with an unrealized loss of about $850,000
item.description: On August 31st, according to the monitoring of HyperInsight (accessible via https://app.hyperliquid.xyz/join/NTOD), the "Big Brother Whale" Huang Lizheng currently has approximately $130 million worth of long positions in ETH and HYPE. There is a floating loss of about $850,000. The details are as follows:· He holds 24,899 long positions in ETH, worth $111 million, with a floating loss of approximately $420,000. The opening price was $4,485.98, and the liquidation price was $3,066.· He holds 420,000 long positions in HYPE, worth $18.75 million, with a floating loss of about $430,000.

item.title: Analyst: Bitcoin Can Hedge Against Selling Pressure on US Bonds
item.description: August 31st. As per CoinDesk, André Dragosch, the European Research Director at Bitwise Asset Management, mentioned that when the stock market is in a downturn, gold serves as the most effective hedge. Meanwhile, Bitcoin demonstrates more resilience when the U.S. bond market is under pressure. Historical data and industry research also back this perspective: gold generally rises during stock market bear markets, while Bitcoin performs better during U.S. Treasury sell-offs.By 2025, the price of gold has increased by more than 30%, and Bitcoin has risen by approximately 16.46%. This reflects the significantly different roles that the two assets play when investors consider rising yields, stock market volatility, and Trump's support for cryptocurrency.

item.title: If Bitcoin surpasses $110,000, the mainstream CEX's total short liquidation volume will reach $514 million.
item.description: On August 31st, based on Coinglass data, if Bitcoin manages to break through $110,000, the cumulative short liquidation intensity on mainstream CEX will reach 514 million.Conversely, if Bitcoin drops below $108,000, the cumulative long liquidation intensity on mainstream CEX will reach 171 million.BlockBeats Notes: The liquidation chart does not provide the exact number of contracts to be liquidated or the precise value of the contracts being liquidated. The bars on the liquidation chart actually represent the significance of each liquidation cluster in relation to adjacent liquidation clusters, that is, intensity.Therefore, the liquidation chart shows to what degree the price of the underlying asset will be impacted when it reaches a certain level. A higher "liquidation bar" indicates that the price will experience a more intense reaction due to the liquidity shock wave after reaching that level.

item.title: DOLO Surges Over 47% in 24 Hours, Currently Trading at $0.3511
item.description: On August 31st, based on HTX market data, DOLO witnessed a surge of more than 47% within the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $0.3511.

item.title: Top Solana Launchpad Market Share in the Last 24 Hours: pump.fun, Meteora DBC, Letsbonk
item.description: On August 31st, as per the Jupiter Data Dashboard, within the past 24 hours in the Solana Launchpad market share ranking, pump.fun took the lead with 49.3%, Meteora DBC came in second with 35.3%, and Letsbonk secured the third position with 10.1%.

item.title: Ethereum PoS Network Exit Queue Decreases to Around 966,000 ETH, Entry Queue Increases to Around 773,000 ETH
item.description: On August 31st, based on the data from the Validator Queue tracking website "validatorqueue", it is currently reported that the exit queue of the Ethereum PoS network is 966,000 ETH. Calculated at the current price, approximately $4.25 billion worth of ETH is leaving the PoS network. The withdrawal delay is currently reported to be 16 days and 19 hours.At the same time, there is a growing demand for staking activations by new validators. The current entry queue is 773,000 ETH, worth around $3.4 billion, and the waiting time in the entry queue is 13 days and 10 hours.

item.title: Metaplanet's stock price has dropped by over 50% since mid-June, and the financing "flywheel" is now failing.
item.description: August 31st: According to Bloomberg, the stock price of the Japanese Bitcoin treasury company Metaplanet has witnessed a decline of more than 50% since mid-June, and its financing "flywheel" is encountering failure. On August 27th, Metaplanet announced its intention to raise $881 million with a view to increasing its Bitcoin holdings during September and October. The financing will be raised through an international stock issuance, and it is expected to achieve a net fundraising of approximately 130.334 billion yen (about $881 million), which is intended for:· Bitcoin purchase: 123.818 billion yen ($837 million)· Bitcoin financial operations: 6.516 billion yen ($44 million)In addition, Eric Trump, the son of former U.S. President Donald Trump, is scheduled to attend the shareholders' meeting of the Japanese Bitcoin financial company Metaplanet Inc on September 1st.
